thread.title: Watch a Samurai Slice a 100 MPH Fastball in Half at a Batting Cage
thread.title_full: Watch a Samurai Slice a 100 MPH Fastball in Half at a Batting Cage | Complex

author: Chris Yuscavage
title: Watch a Samurai Slice a 100 MPH Fastball in Half at a Batting Cage
text:
Most people couldn’t hit a 100 MPH fastball with one of these:
But Japanese laido master Isao Machii isn’t most people. He holds a bunch of Guinness World Records for doing all sorts of insane shit . And in the clip above, you’ll see his latest trick. He took a sword into a batting cage and sliced a 100 MPH fastball in half.
Don't blink, or you'll miss it...
 .
[ via Fox Sports ]
